English.Text:
None of this would have been possible without you - the dedicated and passionate Anno fans who have inspired and empowered us every step along the way.
Our community of “Annoholics” has been our driving force, and these 20 years are a testament to their enthusiasm.

So no matter if this is your very first Anno (and if so, welcome aboard!), or if you have been with us for two decades - THANK YOU, from the bottom of our hearts!
